attributes.action: reduce the number of administration levels - UN, EU, UK, regional, local councils etc etc so that the wage bill is reduced and decisions are consistent and more efficient
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are too many burocrats who 
say they represent us - UN, EU,
westminster and now Scotland, Wales
and N. Ireland have parliaments. We also
have local goverment (several levels).
This has not improved anything - it just
costs the tax payer more to employ more
and more of these people and their huge
number of supporting administrators.
In addition each passes the buck to 
someone else and there's a new trend
to denie knowledge and responsiblity
in general.

Let's fire a whole bunch of these over
paid useless people and use the money
for soemthing (anything is more
useful) better.
